resources.string: The IPs will use this Application to collect and report weekly progress made in estate. The form should be filled in by the IP for each estate covered in the week and submit to WSAF team by end of the week. All questions are mandatory for response unless mentioned otherwise. The IP has to collect and submit the date once in a week for each estate. If there are multiple estates under an IP the form should be filled out seperately for each estate. This form will be used to collect data of activities conducted in a week in a particular tea estate. A new form should be filled out for each tea estate.
Please acknowledge this message before moving ahead.
Something went wrong, please try again after sometime.
General information about the IP and tea estate
What is the name of tea estate
General information about the IP and tea estate
Has PRA Been Conducted In This Tea Estate?
Please note this question should be answered Yes only for the first time a PRA is conducted in an estate. For other weeks you can mark the response as No.
If Yes, Please Specify The Number Of Estate Management Who Participated In The PRA?
If Yes, Please Specify The Number Of Estate Staff Who Participated In The PRA?
If Yes, Please Specify The Number Of Estate Sub-Staff Who Participated In The PRA?
If Yes, Please Specify The Number Of Estate Workers Who Participated In The PRA?
If Yes, Please Specify The Number Of Estate Community Members Who Participated In The PRA?
Training on POSH, DV, POCSO, legal support and justice system
Workshop on Preparation of SoPs at Estate level
Training of Management, staff and workers on Gender Sensitisation
Workshop to identify and appoint estate level First Information Persons (FIP), reporting and record keeping systems
Training of Beneficiary Leads - on Gender and VAW
Facilitation of formation of Informal groups
Training and interaction with youth clubs/ groups and men workers
ToT with staff to create awareness and plan regular activities to prevent VAW in the workplace
Awareness creation of workers by Beneficiary Leads
Identification and ToT of women leaders to create awareness in communities
Visits by Local Opinion Leaders, Role Models, Motivational talk and demonstration of successful case studies
